Blog Careers

Our Campus in Bali

Learn from somewhere you'd rather be

AN ACCELERATED LEARNING ENVIRONMENT

A private pool villa nestled between the rice paddies

We've tried to forget everything we knew about what a school was and reimagined what a school could be. The result is multiple campuses that can be found in incredible locations around the world.

We believe the best learning happens in an exciting and stimulating environment that allows you to take your mind of everyday living.

Everything you need to help you thrive

Apart from being set in beautiful locations, we take care of all the small stuff that usually clogs up your spare time. Our private chef makes sure all your meals are nutritious and most importantly taste amazing.

You don't have to worry about dishes or washing and all your transport needs are taken care of. It's our job to make sure you're in the best frame of mind for learning.

Rejuvenate the body and mind with daily yoga. Our trained yoga instructor caters for all levels of 'enthusiasm'.

Fuel your body with nutritious meals, snacks and smoothies prepared by our private on-site chef.

We make our programs all-inclusive so you can kick back, relax and focus on learning. 

Download a Course Guide
  • 100+ hours practical coursework
  • 9 nights accomodation
  • All meals by an in-house chef
  • Daily yoga & mindfulness meditation
  • Excursions & activities
  • 1 hour massage
  • Airport transfer
  • Course materials
  • Ongoing support & Video Tutorials
  • 12 months web hosting

UPCOMINGDATES & DETAILS

Ready to invest in yourself and learn tangible digital skills? Surround yourself with ambitious, like-minded individuals and experience a new model of learning. Isn't it time that you took a leap of faith in yourself?

10 nights accommodation, all meals, airport transfer, all course materials, ongoing support and daily activities (like yoga) are all included in the price.

GET INTOUCH

Have a few questions before you are ready to take the plunge? Just send us through a message or live chat with us (that adorable icon in the bottom right hand corner) and one of our team will help you figure out the program that's right for you.

AM

Study in
Paradise

After waking up in a tropical paradise, and maybe sneaking in a yoga session or a massage, we will dive in deep and start writing code, learning from doing... with the help of your experienced mentors, see your screen come to life from the very first day. With spectacular scenery as your backdrop, and the chef whipping up ice-cold watermelon granita to keep you refreshed, you can focus on learning, building and creating. When you need a break, take a quick dip in the pool, or sip an ice latte in the sun.

Relax &
Explore

PM

After enjoying a chef-prepared lunch in the shade, get back to it for another 1-2 hours of practical work. Then you are free to spend some one-on-one time with your experienced mentors working on your portfolio, or explore all that the town has to offer. Join us to wander through exotic markets, explore ancient rainforests, hit the surf or just relax with a cocktail by the pool. At night we'll gather back together in the villa for an indulgent 3+ course meal and some great company. 

The Institute of Code

Institute of Code runs 10 day immersive bootcamps on topics like coding and digital marketing in beautiful locations around the world. We create an environment of accelerated learning, so you can learn in demand digital skills while having an experience of a lifetime.
